H0.text: Which early sixties singer was backed by The Bruvvers. Billy Fury

H1.text: Which early sixties singer was backed by The Bruvvers. Vince Eager

H2.text: Which early sixties singer was backed by The Bruvvers. Craig Douglas

H3.text: Which early sixties singer was backed by The Bruvvers. Joe brown

A4.text: In 1962, 'Joe Brown and the Bruvvers' was cemented, containing two members of the Spacemen, brothers Tony and Pete Oakman.

A5.text: Joe Brown's recording band was a collection of session musicians, and was named the Bruvvers by Jack Good, to give Brown the identity of having his own backing band for record releases.
